description:
Tenma has to rough it when she locks herself in a storage room at school! Harima feels the pain when his attempt to confess his love to Tenma comes to a crashing halt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Houkago no Survival! / Kokuhaku no Toki wa Arrival! / Futarikiri no Hospital!
Nach Schulschluss: Survival! Bei der Liebeserklärung: Arrival! Nach Unfall: Hospital!
Survival After School! / Arrival When Confessing! / Hospital for Two!
放課後のサバイバル! / 告白の時はアライバル! / 二人きりのホスピタル
